head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NUMEROFF, DR. SEYMOUR

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NUMEROFF, DR. SEYMOUR

block.p: NUMEROFF-Dr. Seymour. Your valiant struggle is now over and at last your are at peace. Our thoughts are with you Harriet, and the magnificent wife you were; one in a million. Goodbye dear friend, we will always miss you. Carol and Don Schiffman
NUMEROFF-Seymour G., DDS Our deepest and most heartfelt condolences to the entire Numeroff family. Micky and Phil Eisenpresser
